main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed over the Atlantic Ocean from November 16-24, 1964, with tracking on radar.
interesting points: The observation recorded a bright, glowing, saucer-shaped object tracked at a distance of 40 miles on radar., The radar contacts were noted to be approximately 40 feet in diameter., At an altitude of about 15,000 feet, the object was visually seen orbiting the area., The radar contact was observed for approximately 20 minutes before fading from the radar scope., The object emitted no sound during the observation.
witness description: Radar contacts observed by flight crew.
